Universalist: +1 Class Feat
Wizard Feats: 10 selections
Wizard Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Club; Crossbow; Dagger; Heavy Crossbow; Staff; Unarmed Attacks)
Enhanced Familiar: Can select 4 familiar or master abilities each day
Familiar: Has a Tiny animal minion
Half-Elf: Has the elf trait and may take elf and half-elf feats
Improved Familiar Attunement: Familiar is the focus of Arcane Bond and has 4 additional abilities
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)

Acrobatics: +26 (dexterity; trained) Hunting Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)

Wizard Skills: Skill Trained (Arcana; Choose 6 from any)
Assurance (Crafting): Can take an automatic 34 on Crafting checks
Quick Recognition: Can use a skill with master proficiency to Recognize Spell as a free action once per rd
Recognize Spell: (R) Successful roll of the connected skill gives recognition of a spell; critical success also gives +1 against effects, and critical failure misidentifies it; trained, expert, master, or legendary proficiency guarantees success on spells up to level 2, 4, 6, or 10
Rock Runner: Does not suffer flat-footed when using Acrobatics to Balance on stone and earth, and successes to do so are critical successes
Stonewalker: Can find unusual stonework and stonework traps that require legendary Perception
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Combat
Hit Points: 208 Armor Class: 38 (dexterity; expert)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Blowgun (+26 1 P R20'; dexterity; trained); Dart (+26 1d4+4 P R20'; dexterity; trained); Morningstar (+26 1d6+4 B/P; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Defensive Robes: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Dwarven Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Battle Axe; Pick; Warhammer; Dwarf Weapons)
Dwarven Weapon Familiarity: Attack Trained (Battle Axe; Pick; Warhammer)/Weapon Familiarity (Dwarf Weapons)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Weapon Proficiency (Martial Weapons): Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)
Weapon Proficiency (Orc Necksplitter): Attack Trained (Orc Necksplitter)
Weapon Proficiency (Sawtooth Saber): Attack Trained (Sawtooth Saber)
Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons): Attack Trained (Simple Weapons)
Dwarven Weapon Cunning: Critical hits with a battle axe, pick, warhammer, or dwarf weapon inflict its critical specialization effect
Dwarven Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon dwarf weapons
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Magical Fortitude: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: A10: 2; A1: 11; A2: 11; A3: 11; A4: 11; A5: 11; A6: 11; A7: 11; A8: 11; A9: 11; AC1: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Arcane: +32 (intelligence; legendary); Divine Innate: +26 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Arcane: 42 (intelligence; legendary); Divine Innate: 36 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Augment Summoning (A1 Foc Con): (1) R30' Summoned target gains +1 on all checks for 1 min
Call Of The Grave (A1 Foc Nec): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts sickened 1, or sickened 2 and slowed 1 until no longer sickened on a critical success
Charming Words (A1 Foc Enc): (1) R30' Prevents the target from taking hostile actions against self for 1 rd (save Will target suffers -1 attack and damage vs. self; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stunned 1)
Dimensional Steps (A4 Foc Con): (1) Teleports self to a visible location within 20' (heightened +1 gives +5' teleport distance)
Diviner's Sight (A1 Foc Div): (1) R30' Target may substitute self's d20 roll for a saving throw or skill check within 1 rd
Dread Aura (A4 Foc Enc): (2) 30' emanation inflicts frightened 1 on foes while sustained for up to 1 min
Elemental Tempest (A4 Foc Evo): (1) Subsequent casting of an acid, cold, electricity, or fire spell inflicts 1d6 HP per spell level of the same damage type on foes in a 10' emanation
Energy Absorption (A4 Foc Abj): (R) Gives self resistance 15 to damage from the triggering acid, cold, electricity, or fire effect (heightened +1 gives +5 resistance)
Force Bolt (A1 Foc Evo): (1) R30' Inflicts 1d4+1 HP force (heightened +2 inflicts +1d4+1 HP)
Hand Of The Apprentice (A1 Foc Evo): (1) R500' Makes a remote attack with a melee weapon; a critical hit inflicts the critical specialization effect
Invisibility Cloak (A4 Foc Ill): (2) Self becomes invisible for 1 min; using a hostile action ends the spell (heightened 6th effects last 10 min; 8th effects last 1 hr)
Life Siphon (A4 Foc Nec): (R) Casting a necromancy spell restores 1d8 HP per spell level to self
Meld Into Stone (D3 Tra): (2) Allows self to enter a touched stone, retaining the ability to hear outside sounds, for 10 min
Physical Boost (A1 Foc Tra): (1) Touched gains +2 on the next Acrobatics check, Athletics check, Fortitude save, or Reflex save within the next rd
Protective Ward (A1 Foc Abj): (1) 5' emanation gives +1 Armor Class to self and allies while sustained for up to 1 min; each Sustain increases the radius by 5'
Shifting Form (A4 Foc Tra): (1) Self gains +20' Speed, a 12' climb or swim Speed, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, or claws that inflict 1d8 HP slashing for 1 min
Vigilant Eye (A4 Foc Div): (1) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see from the target location for 1 hr; spending a Focus Point extends the duration to 2 hr
Warped Terrain (A1 Foc Ill): (1) R60' 5' burst (2 or 3 actions give a 10' or 15' burst) illusion inflicts difficult terrain for 1 min (heightened 4th affects air instead of surface)
Magic Notes:
Abjuration: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Protective Ward arcane spell
Advanced School Spell (Abjuration): Knows the Energy Absorption arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced School Spell (Conjuration): Knows the Dimensional Steps arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced School Spell (Divination): Knows the Vigilant Eye arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced School Spell (Enchantment): Knows the Dread Aura arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced School Spell (Evocation): Knows the Elemental Tempest arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced School Spell (Illusion): Knows the Invisibility Cloak arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced School Spell (Necromancy): Knows the Life Siphon arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Advanced School Spell (Transmutation): Knows the Shifting Form arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Archwizard's Might: +1 10th level spell slot
Archwizard's Spellcraft: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Conjuration: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Augment Summoning arcane spell
Divination: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Diviner's Sight arcane spell
Enchantment: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Charming Words arcane spell
Evocation: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Force Bolt arcane spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Arcane)
Hand Of The Apprentice: Knows the Hand Of The Apprentice arcane spell/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Illusion: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Warped Terrain arcane spell
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Arcane)
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Arcane)
Necromancy: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Call Of The Grave arcane spell
Stonewalker: Knows the Meld Into Stone divine innate spell; can cast it at 3rd level once per day
Transmutation: +1 spell slot each level/Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point/Knows the Physical Boost arcane spell
Universal Versatility: +1 Focus Points
Abjuration: Knows 1 additional 1st-level abjuration spell
Arcane Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the arcane tradition
Bespell Weapon: (F) After casting a non-cantrip spell, causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d6 HP until the end of the turn once per turn; the damage type depends on the spell school
Bizarre Magic: Increases DCs by 5 to Recognize Spells and Identify Magic on self spells and magic use
Bond Conservation: (1) Subsequent Drain Bonded Item leaves enough power to cast another spell 2 levels lower by the end of the next turn
Bonded Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare 2 additional cantrips each day or add 2 additional cantrips to repertoire
Clever Counterspell: Can attempt a Counterspell with a -2 penalty vs. a known spell using any spell that shares a non-tradition trait with it
Conceal Spell: (1) Hides spellcasting from observers with a successful Stealth vs. Perception, plus a successful Deception vs. Perception for verbal spells
Conjuration: Knows 1 additional 1st-level conjuration spell
Counterspell: (R) Expends a spell slot to attempt to counteract a spell with the same spell
Divination: Knows 1 additional 1st-level divination spell
Drain Bonded Item: (F) Can cast an expended spell using power stored in a possession once per day
Effortless Concentration: (F) Sustains an active spell
Enchantment: Knows 1 additional 1st-level enchantment spell
Eschew Materials: Can replace spell material components with sigils drawn in the air
Evocation: Knows 1 additional 1st-level evocation spell
Illusion: Knows 1 additional 1st-level illusion spell
Infinite Possibilities: Can prepare a spell slot to allow the casting of any known spell of at least 2 levels lower
Linked Focus: Draining a bonded item to cast a spell from specialist school restores 1 Focus Point once per day
Magic Sense: Has continuous 1st-level Detect Magic effects that increase to 3rd-level during Seek
Metamagic Mastery: Can use single-action metamagic effects as free actions
Metamagical Experimentation: Can choose 1 metamagic feat of up to level 10 to use each day during daily prep
Necromancy: Knows 1 additional 1st-level necromancy spell
Overwhelming Energy: (1) Subsequent spell ignores resistance 20 to energy
Quickened Casting: (F) Reduces the time required to cast a spell of level 8 or lower by 1 action once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Reflect Spell: Can cause a successful Counterspell to inflict the spell effects on the caster
Reprepare Spell: Can spend 10 min to prepare a previously-cast instantaneous spell of up to 4th level or another instantaneous spell of the same level
Scroll Savant: Can prepare 4 temporary scrolls with spells up to level 8 during daily prep
Silent Spell: (1) Subsequent spell casting requires no verbal components
Spell Blending: Can use 2 spell slots from a level to prepare a spell up to 2 levels higher or use a spell slot to prepare 2 cantrips
Spell Combination: Can prepare a spell slot of each level above 2nd to cast a combination of 2 spells of 2 levels lower
Spell Penetration: Reduces any target status bonus to saves vs. self spells by 1
Spell Substitution: Can use a 10-min process to replace 1 prepared spell with a different spell
Spell Tinker: (2) Alters the ongoing effect choice of a spell cast on self, reducing its remaining duration by half
Steady Spellcasting: Successful DC 15 flat check negates spellcasting disruption
Superior Bond: Can use Drain Bonded Item to cast another spell of up to level 8 once per day
Transmutation: Knows 1 additional 1st-level transmutation spell
Universal Versatility: Can prepare a school focus spell during daily prep and Refocus
Universalist: Can use Drain Bonded Item once per spell level each day/Knows 1 additional 1st-level spell
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone spell by 10'
Notes
